title: Ministry of Sound Anthems II 2008 [MP3 @ 320](oan)
description:
The follow up to last year's epic album, which racked up over half a million sales, Ministry of Sound proudly present 'Anthems II'; three CDs filled with the finest club classics of all time!

This time around Ministry of Sound have dug even deeper, leaving no stone unturned, in making sure the second in the series more than lives up to its predecessor. Each track has been handpicked and only the finest quality dance anthems represent.

Going back as far as 1991 with the likes of New Order & Orbital, and continuing in chronological order until Eric Prydz's latest smash 'Pjanoo', the biggest anthems in the history dance all feature as Stardust, Faithless, Modjo, Livin Joy, Ultra NatÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â©, D:Ream, Robert Miles and Daft Punk, to name just to name a few, all join the party!

An album truly representing clubbing history, this is Anthems II.
